lead_paragraph: Esther Medley is 94 and legally blind, but she still managed to roll a 244 at Fairway Lanes in Centralia, Wash. Medley cannot see straight ahead, so her 86-year-old husband, Ralph, tells her which pins are left after her first ball. She finished with eight strikes in the second-highest score of the year in her league.
